meanings.definition: A medical condition characterized by an abnormal lateral curvature of the spine.
meanings.sent1: Scolioses can cause back pain and difficulty breathing.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend exercises to help manage scolioses.
meanings.sent3: The family joked that their pet cat had scolioses from always arching its back.
meanings.sent4: Her love for dancing was like scolioses, bending her path in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The image of the twisted tree trunk resembled the scolioses of nature.
